pullrequest.title: Prevent xml parser error from crashing LogPlay on osx -> gazebo7

content.raw:
To speed up testing, I'm merging my changes from pull request #2130 (branch `unit_test_dependencies`) into my local copy of this branch. I can compile the test without compiling the physics or sensor libraries.

`</spam></advertisements>`
